objects.description: [Contagious Interview](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1052) has conducted key word searches within files and directories on a compromised hosts to identify files for exfiltration.(Citation: ESET Contagious Interview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret February 2025)(Citation: PaloAlto ContagiousInterview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret November 2023)
